name: E5C4P3
description:
E5C4P3 is a 2D, side-scrolling, limited runner created as a several-week project for the MAGD 487 Portfolio Development Capstone course. It is an individual project, and meant to be an addition to the portfolio of MAGD students' portfolios. 

This project was coded and created by Cole Miller, with original art by Cole Miller, and sound design by Cole Miller and public audio libraries.
